name: part_003
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Amane Kanata performing 'I can't stop my love for you'.
scenes.song_name: I can't stop my love for you

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Houshou Marine performing 'Rondo-revolution'.

subtitles.original: I can't stop my love for you ❤️
subtitles.english: I can't stop my love for you ❤️

subtitles.original: ...の意味を
subtitles.english: ...the meaning of...

subtitles.original: I can't stop my love for you
subtitles.english: I can't stop my love for you

subtitles.original: 二人歩むスピードは
subtitles.english: The speed at which we two walk...

subtitles.original: きっと同じはずじゃないからね
subtitles.english: ...surely won't be the same.

subtitles.original: もしも君の隣に　この手が離れた時は
subtitles.english: If, when I'm by your side, this hand should let go...

subtitles.original: 見失わないように　きっと　迎えに来てね
subtitles.english: ...so you don't lose sight of me, please come for me.

subtitles.original: 大嫌いなんて　嘘でも言わないけど
subtitles.english: I wouldn't say I hate you, even as a lie.

subtitles.original: 大好きだって　嘘なんかじゃ意味ないからね
subtitles.english: Because saying I love you means nothing if it's a lie.

subtitles.original: 会えない時さえ君は　何も考える余裕もないくらい
subtitles.english: Even when we can't meet, I don't have time to think of anything else...

subtitles.original: この心　独り占めにするんだから
subtitles.english: ...because you've taken over my heart.

subtitles.original: I can't stop my love for you
subtitles.english: I can't stop my love for you

subtitles.original: 二つの愛が離れて
subtitles.english: So our two loves don't...

subtitles.original: しまわないように一つに抱いてて
subtitles.english: ...drift apart, hold them as one.

subtitles.original: それでも不安な夜は　訪れるものだからね
subtitles.english: Even so, nights of anxiety will still come.

subtitles.original: そんな時はぎゅっと　大袈裟に抱きしめていて
subtitles.english: At those times, hold me tight, even if it's an exaggeration.

subtitles.original: かけがえのない今を　君が沢山ここにくれた
subtitles.english: You've given me so much of this irreplaceable "now".

subtitles.original: だけど何よりも一番　かけがえのないものは
subtitles.english: But the thing that's more irreplaceable than anything else...

subtitles.original: 君なんだ
subtitles.english: ...is you.

subtitles.original: I can't stop my love for you
subtitles.english: I can't stop my love for you

subtitles.original: 二人が辿る未来に
subtitles.english: In the future we two follow...

subtitles.original: 君との居場所があるように
subtitles.english: ...I hope there's a place for me by your side.

subtitles.original: Oh baby I can't stop my love for you
subtitles.english: Oh baby I can't stop my love for you

subtitles.original: 君のすべてになってね
subtitles.english: Be my everything.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ手信じて　歩いてゆくと誓うよ
subtitles.english: Believing in our joined hands, I vow to walk on.

subtitles.original: 輪舞-revolution / 作詞：奥井雅美 作曲：矢吹俊郎
subtitles.english: Rondo-revolution / Lyrics: Masami Okui, Composition: Toshiro Yabuki

subtitles.original: 潔く カッコよく 生きてゆこう
subtitles.english: Let's live purely and coolly.

subtitles.original: たとえ二人離ればなれになっても
subtitles.english: Even if we two are pulled apart...

subtitles.original: Take my revolution
subtitles.english: Take my revolution

subtitles.original: 光さす庭で手を取り合い
subtitles.english: Joining hands in the sunlit garden...

subtitles.original: 誓い合ったなぐさめ合った
subtitles.english: ...we made vows and comforted each other.

subtitles.original: もう恋は二度としないよって
subtitles.english: Saying we'd never fall in love again.

subtitles.original: そんな強い結束は形を変え
subtitles.english: That strong bond has changed its form...

subtitles.original: 今じゃこんなに逞しい私達の
subtitles.english: ...to our current, resilient...

subtitles.original: ライフスタイル エブリディ エブリタイム
subtitles.english: ...lifestyle, every day, every time.

subtitles.original: 頬寄せ合って写る写真の笑顔に
subtitles.english: In the smiles of the photos taken with cheeks together...

subtitles.original: 少しの寂しさ詰め込んで
subtitles.english: ...I packed a little bit of loneliness.

subtitles.original: 潔く カッコよく 明日からは
subtitles.english: Purely and coolly, from tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 誰もが振り向く女になる
subtitles.english: ...I'll become a woman everyone turns to look at.

subtitles.original: たとえ二人離ればなれになっても
subtitles.english: Even if we two are pulled apart...

subtitles.original: 心はずっと一緒に
subtitles.english: ...our hearts will always be together.
